problems.title: Spiral Matrix Traversal
problems.description: Print all elements of a matrix in spiral order (clockwise from outside to inside).
problems.inputFormat: First line: r c (rows and columns)\nNext r lines: c space-separated integers each
problems.outputFormat: Print elements in spiral order space-separated

sampleTestCases.explanation: Spiral: right(1,2,3), down(6,9), left(8,7), up(4), center(5)

problems.title: Rotate Matrix 90 Degrees
problems.description: Rotate a square matrix 90 degrees clockwise in-place.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (matrix size)\nNext n lines: n space-separated integers each
problems.outputFormat: Print rotated matrix (n lines with n space-separated integers)

problems.title: Wave Traversal
problems.description: Print matrix in wave form: column 0 top-to-bottom, column 1 bottom-to-top, column 2 top-to-bottom, etc.
problems.inputFormat: First line: r c (rows and columns)\nNext r lines: c space-separated integers each
problems.outputFormat: Print elements in wave order space-separated

sampleTestCases.explanation: Col 0 down(1,4,7), col 1 up(8,5,2), col 2 down(3,6,9)

problems.title: Matrix Multiplication
problems.description: Multiply two matrices and print the result.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: r1 c1 (first matrix dimensions)
Next r1 lines: c1 integers
Next line: r2 c2 (second matrix, where c1=r2)
Next r2 lines: c2 integers
problems.outputFormat: Print result matrix (r1 lines with c2 integers)

problems.title: Symmetric Matrix Check
problems.description: Check if a square matrix is symmetric (matrix[i][j] = matrix[j][i]). Print 'YES' or 'NO'.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (matrix size)\nNext n lines: n space-separated integers each
problems.outputFormat: Print 'YES' if symmetric, 'NO' otherwise

problems.title: Search in Row-Column Sorted Matrix
problems.description: Search for element in matrix where each row and column is sorted. Print row and column if found, else '-1 -1'.
problems.inputFormat: First line: r c (rows and columns)\nNext r lines: c space-separated integers (row and column sorted)\nLast line: x (element to search)
problems.outputFormat: Print 'row col' (0-indexed) if found, else '-1 -1'

problems.title: Set Matrix Zeros
problems.description: If an element is 0, set its entire row and column to 0. Print the modified matrix.
problems.inputFormat: First line: r c (rows and columns)\nNext r lines: c space-separated integers each
problems.outputFormat: Print modified matrix (r lines with c integers)

sampleTestCases.explanation: Element at (1,1) is 0, so row 1 and column 1 become 0

problems.title: Diagonal Traversal
problems.description: Print all diagonals of matrix from top-left to bottom-right, starting from first row then first column.
problems.inputFormat: First line: r c (rows and columns)\nNext r lines: c space-separated integers each
problems.outputFormat: Print each diagonal on separate line, space-separated

problems.title: Maximum Sum Rectangle
problems.description: Find the maximum sum of any rectangular submatrix.
problems.inputFormat: First line: r c (rows and columns)\nNext r lines: c space-separated integers each
problems.outputFormat: Print the maximum sum

problems.title: Saddle Point
problems.description: Find saddle point: element that is minimum in its row and maximum in its column. Print value or -1.
problems.inputFormat: First line: r c (rows and columns)\nNext r lines: c space-separated integers each
problems.outputFormat: Print saddle point value or -1 if none exists

sampleTestCases.explanation: 7 is minimum in row 2 and maximum in column 0

problems.title: Row with Maximum 1s
problems.description: In a binary matrix where each row is sorted, find the row with maximum number of 1s. Print row index.
problems.inputFormat: First line: r c (rows and columns)\nNext r lines: c space-separated 0s and 1s (each row sorted)
problems.outputFormat: Print row index (0-indexed) with most 1s

problems.title: Zigzag Traversal
problems.description: Print matrix in zigzag: row 0 left-to-right, row 1 right-to-left, row 2 left-to-right, etc.
problems.inputFormat: First line: r c (rows and columns)\nNext r lines: c space-separated integers each
problems.outputFormat: Print elements in zigzag order space-separated

problems.title: Count Islands
problems.description: Count number of islands in binary matrix. Island is group of connected 1s (horizontal/vertical only).
problems.inputFormat: First line: r c (rows and columns)\nNext r lines: c space-separated 0s and 1s
problems.outputFormat: Print number of islands

problems.title: Print Border Elements Clockwise
problems.description: Print all border layers of matrix clockwise, from outermost to innermost.
problems.inputFormat: First line: r c (rows and columns)\nNext r lines: c space-separated integers each
problems.outputFormat: Print each border layer on separate line, space-separated

problems.title: Magic Square Check
problems.description: Check if matrix is a magic square (all rows, columns, and diagonals sum to same value). Print 'YES' or 'NO'.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n (matrix size)\nNext n lines: n space-separated integers each
problems.outputFormat: Print 'YES' if magic square, 'NO' otherwise

sampleTestCases.explanation: All rows, columns, diagonals sum to 15

problems.title: Largest Rectangle of 1s
problems.description: Find area of largest rectangle containing only 1s in binary matrix.
problems.inputFormat: First line: r c (rows and columns)\nNext r lines: c space-separated 0s and 1s
problems.outputFormat: Print maximum rectangle area

problems.title: Toeplitz Matrix Check
problems.description: Check if matrix is Toeplitz (every diagonal from top-left to bottom-right has same elements). Print 'YES' or 'NO'.
problems.inputFormat: First line: r c (rows and columns)\nNext r lines: c space-separated integers each
problems.outputFormat: Print 'YES' if Toeplitz, 'NO' otherwise

problems.title: Kth Smallest Element in Matrix
problems.description: Find kth smallest element in a row-wise and column-wise sorted matrix.
problems.inputFormat: First line: n k (matrix size and k)\nNext n lines: n space-separated integers (sorted rows and columns)
problems.outputFormat: Print kth smallest element

problems.title: Count Negative Numbers in Sorted Matrix
problems.description: Count negative numbers in matrix where rows and columns are sorted in non-increasing order.
problems.inputFormat: First line: r c (rows and columns)\nNext r lines: c space-separated integers (sorted non-increasing)
problems.outputFormat: Print count of negative numbers

problems.title: Reshape Matrix
problems.description: Reshape matrix from r×c to r2×c2 if possible (r*c = r2*c2). Print reshaped matrix or 'IMPOSSIBLE'.
problems.inputFormat: First line: r c r2 c2\nNext r lines: c space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print reshaped matrix (r2 lines with c2 integers) or 'IMPOSSIBLE'
